fields.summary: User display name shows as "(null) YouKnowWho"
Mentions do not render correctly in CQ email notifications
CQ Email notifications have broken inline images

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48059].
  {panel}

Hi,

I have 1.1k points in Answers, but I can't delete other users comments.
I have the button "Delete" and "Convert to answer" on my own comments.

Regards,
Gustavo Refosco
fields.summary: Delete Comment link is not displayed for users who have enough reputation to delete others' comments

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48057].
  {panel}

As soon as the textarea/editor under "Your answer" got focus, the "Add answer" button get disabled.
I've a lot of errors in the console:

Consider using 'dppx' units instead of 'dpi', as in CSS 'dpi' means dots-per-CSS-inch, not dots-per-physical-inch, so does not correspond to the actual 'dpi' of a screen. In media query expression: only screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 1.5), only screen and (min-resolution: 144dpi)

fields.summary: Cannot answer a question on chrome  33.0.1750.3 dev-m
Broken images when editing a question
Email notifications have [confluence] subject prefix
Duplicate item "People" in menu bar
Watchers were not migrated for specific label

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48048].
  {panel}

I make this issue as blocker because compare to production version, it now even loss the error message dialog
*Steps to reproduce*
- Create a Confluence Question. You could add comment and answers in there too
- In view mode Drag and drop a file 

*In SDOG*
- Trigger uploading, after finish, it will show error message: "Cannot find PageID or Draft ID"
*In current OD37 https://od37.jira-dev.com/wiki *
- After the bar complete, it the dialog staty there for a long time, return 500 error in console ( Same with SDOG) and show error message "error responding" in UI 

*Side note*
This issue somehow affect greatly to https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CQ-1638 to decide that if it is a blocker or not. If I test with User B try to drag and drop a question created by user A, it trigger the uploading process but fail at this step so we don't know should we treat CQ-1638 as a new issue or not
fields.summary: [Confluence question] Drag and drop a file in Confluence Question page will trigger the uploading but fail in the end
Personal Information Visible on User's Profile Page

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48045].
  {panel}

Steps to reproduce: 

# Create a question
# Navigate to Administration > Confluence Questions Configuration and restrict access to questions to a group of users (say confluence-users)
# Grant anonymous users "use" permission
# Logout and then navigate to Confluence dashboard
fields.summary: Question items appear on the popular stream for anonymous users even with restrictions in place
Strange visual artifacts on the side
Duplicated action module causes health check to fail

fields.description: Now that questions can be associated with a space, the option to specify the space is missing from the "Ask a Question" button created by the Questions List Macro.  If you create the button through the "Create from Template" macro using the "Ask a Question" template, you have the ability to specify a space. You should have the same option in the Questions List macro.
fields.summary: Ask a Question button in the Questions List macro doesn't let you specify a space

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48040].
  {panel}

I was researching previous answers to the jira/clearquest syncing question.   I found this answer and a the link on bob swift's answer is broken.  It is also displaying a paragraph closing tag.

The question I was looking at was
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/4795/sync-jira-with-clearquest

Look at Bob swift's answer and you should see ending paragraph tag.
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/1924/jira-clearquest-integration/1928</p<>>
This link does not work.

The link should have been
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/1924/jira-clearquest-integration

This might be related to the broken comment links but it was the paragraph ending tag being part of the link that I thought made this issue different.
fields.summary: Scan content on Answers to search for broken URLs and report on links that give a non 200 OK response
Answers do not render correctly in a user's profile activity stream or in the recently updated macro
when searching topics the number of questions and Watch status is not displayed

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48036].
  {panel}

Trying to view a question from a deleted user causes NPE and stacktrace.

*Steps to reproduce:*
1. create user A
2. ask question as user A
3. delete user A
4. view question as admin

we should check if the same holds true for comments and answers as well.

{code}
Cause
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: author is required
    at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.model.QuestionImpl.<init>(QuestionImpl.java:51)
Stack Trace:[hide]
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: author is required
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.model.QuestionImpl.<init>(QuestionImpl.java:51)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.model.QuestionImplBuilder.build(QuestionImplBuilder.java:118)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.service.QuestionServiceImpl.toQuestion(QuestionServiceImpl.java:751)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.service.QuestionServiceImpl.isWatching(QuestionServiceImpl.java:412)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.actions.ViewQuestionAction.execute(ViewQuestionAction.java:42)
{code}
fields.summary: Can't view question when the author has been deleted
Autocomplete broken in CQ editor

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48033].
  {panel}

See attached screenshots of the overall leaderboard:

!^overall-leaderboard.png!

And a topic-specific leaderboard:

!^bamboo-leaderboard.png!

All the leaders in the topic-specific leaderboard have their reputation filtered to only show their status in the specified topic. Whereas, for the overall leader, the total amount of reputation is shown.
fields.summary: Filtering leaderboard by topic still shows the total, overall reputation for the top user, instead of a filtered total
When viewing a user's profile in CQ Standalone mode, the profile page is not fixed width
Commenting on a question from Mobile Safari no longer works

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48029].
  {panel}

If Confluence question is installed on a Confluence in conjunction with Oracle 11g  the statistics page will not display anything:
!Usage Statistics not showing up.PNG|thumbnail!

If you check the atlassian-confluence logs you will see the following error:
{code}
015-03-16 19:19:14,703 ERROR [http-bio-8090-exec-2950] [common.error.jersey.ThrowableExceptionMapper] toResponse Uncaught exception thrown by REST service: StatementCallback; uncategorized SQLException for SQL [select count("tmp"."creator")
from ((select "CONTENT"."CREATOR" "creator"
from "CONTENT" "CONTENT"
where "CONTENT"."PLUGINKEY" in ('com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-questions:question', 'com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-questions:answer', 'com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-questions:comment') and "CONTENT"."PREVVER" is null)
union
(select "AO_B1DBB9_VOTE"."USER_KEY"
from "AO_B1DBB9_VOTE" "AO_B1DBB9_VOTE")) "tmp"]; SQL state [72000]; error code [12704]; ORA-12704: character set mismatch
; nested exception is java.sql.SQLException: ORA-12704: character set mismatch

	at org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate$1QueryStatementCallback.doInStatement(JdbcTemplate.java:443)
	at org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate.execute(JdbcTemplate.java:396)
	... 272 more
{code}
fields.summary: The Usage Statistics doesn't show up in Questions when Confluence is installed in Oracle 11g

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48028].
  {panel}

Steps to reproduce
1. Open any question
2. You'll see that answer editor is already opened for you
3. Click icon 'Attach Image' ( _without_ clicking anywhere on editor)
4. You'll see "You are not permitted to perform this operation" dialog (screenshot attached)
5. Provide file via upload dialog
6.  You'll see "The server may be unavailable" message (screenshot attached)
fields.summary: Can't attach image to answer unless clicked on editor field first

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48027].
  {panel}

Hey Guys,

Here's a feedback from my side. The thing I don't like is the default order of questions by popularity. I haven't found a way to have the order changed as my default order. When I click on questions the old order is restored. So I have to click twice questions and recent in order to refresh the list of questions in my favorite order. 

Beside that it actually looks awesome.

Cheers,
Udo
fields.summary: tabs on the CQ dashboard are not sticky

mentions do not render users correctly in email notifications
Answers karma associated with the wrong Confluence Questions account?

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48019].
  {panel}

The permissions I have set exclude certain users from posting questions, however they are still able to go directly to the URL and raise a question AND they still see the "Didn't find what you were looking for? Ask a question" panel on search results page.

STR:
1) Set group permissions on Confluence Questions.
2) Log into a user who is NOT a member of this group.
3a) Go to [base url]/questions.
3b) Perform a search.

Expected Result:
The user is not allowed to view questions or raise a question.

Actual Result:
The user is shown questions and is able to raise questions.
fields.summary: Unauthorized users can ask questions

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48018].
  {panel}

Steps:
- Try to create an answer. This time attach file but don't add it into the content of answer. After that save an empty answer. It will tell you that it's not allowed.
- Click on "insert image" button again and you will get error "Error retrieve contain...."

This issue is found in version confluence-questions-1.0.618 of Confluence question, Confluence 5.5.6, before the rework of "insert image dialog" apply
fields.summary: Fail creating an answer will cause the "insert image dialog" fail to retrieve contains
Mentions are not working

fields.description: {panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa} *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48014]. {panel} Larger image files are now being stored for the user avatars as part of CONFDEV-26653. This breaks some of the Confluence Questions pages where the avatar is being displayed with 256x256 dimensions (the image file size) rather than as 48x48 icons as expected (see both attachments). By inspecting the image in the browser, the following is shown: {code} {code} Manually changing the {code}aui-avatar-big{code} class to {code}aui-avatar-large{code} (in compliance with [ADG|https://developer.atlassian.com/design/1.5/foundations/avatars/]) fixes the issue and the image appears with 48x48 dimensions as expected. It's unclear as to what the 'aui-avatar-big' class is being used for as no CSS seems to appear specifically for this. The temporary fix from confluence-core is to override the CSS for when these avatars are being displayed, but a more permanent fix is needed.
fields.summary: Avatar sizes not properly set to 48x48
Unable to upload attachments to answers
'Answers' tab in 'Experts' page does not show answer from questions in a particular space
Number of questions in a topic not consistent with what questions a user can see

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48007].
  {panel}

I got a user called "dennis+migration"

When I click on the account name, it takes me to:

https://answers-confluence.atlassian.com/questions/users?username=dennis+migration

However, it should be 

https://answers-confluence.atlassian.com/questions/users?username=dennis%2Bmigration
fields.summary: Usernames are not properly encoded

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48006].
  {panel}

There is no apparent way to update an attachment that was previously uploaded and linked in an answer. 

Steps to reproduce:
# Author an answer in CQ and use the Link function to upload an attachment and link it to a word or phrase in the answer
# Save the answer in CQ
# Update the attachment locally
# Edit the answer in CQ
# Click the linked text and choose Edit
# Click browse to upload the new version of the attachment (after the upload, there are now two attachments showing in the UI and the newer one appears to be highlighted although there is no modification date or version information to distinguish the to attachments)
# Click Save for the Link
# Click Save for the edited answer
# Hover over the link--note that ?version=1 still shows in the URL
# Click on the link and note that the original version of the attachment is downloaded
fields.summary: Unable to update attachments in answers
‘A topic with this name already exists’ message is not displayed when adding an existent topic through firefox

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-48003].
  {panel}

I am trying to ask a new question in Confluence Questions. It is no longer allowing me to create the question because it says I have to add at least one topic. When I add topics - either new ones or from the popular list - it just deletes them again and tells me I can't create the question until I add a topic....
(i have just come back from 1 week holiday in which time no-one else has used the trial version of Confluence or Confluence Questions as far as I can tell. Before the holiday I was able to create questions :( ).
I note that the 'Choose some topics for your question' appears as if it were a topic in the field, with the 'x' present to delete it which is also odd. Screen shot attached.
The second screen shot is what I see after pressing 'Add question'
fields.summary: Can't add a topic to a question

  {panel}

Populate CQ with some questions.
Add the Questions List macro to a page and set it to filter on popular.
Macro reports "No questions have been asked here yet. Click the button below to ask the first one."

a) There are several questions already asked and answered so that message is incorrect.

b) The "Ask a question" button isn't below - it is up and to the right, i.e. "above"

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47982].
  {panel}

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Ensure some questions exist in the system
# Create a Questions List Macro
# Select 'popular'
# Enter a topic which does not have any questions asked about it yet
# Observe that the Questions List contains other questions which do not contain the topic entered.
# Change the macro to 'recent'
# Observe that the macro now correctly displays 'No questions found'

h3. Workarounds
* Create some questions with that topic
* Use 'recent' or 'unanswered' in the macro, instead of 'popular'

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47970].
  {panel}

When trying to watch Topics, users can only see the actual watch/unwatch status of the first 12 items that are displayed.

If a user clicks on 'Watch' link of Topic 13 and up it seems to work fine. However, after refreshing the screen the 'Watch' link is displayed. See attachments for more details.

If the user enters on the topic he can see if he's either watching or not watching the Topic without problems. The issue is that it is not reflected on the Topics list page.

*Environment: Confluence OnDemand 5.6-OD-37-042, Confluence Questions 1.1.36*
fields.summary: Topics on a higher than 12th position are displayed as unwatched
Click area in code/image toolbar buttons too small

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47965].
  {panel}

On the new Answers site, I ran a search for mentions of our products or certain keywords and the search results returned are minimal, not covering content we know is there.  For instance:

- search "dataplane" -- one article is returned.  There are dozens of mentions across the old Answers.
- same with "arsenale' -- a dozen or so, but should be a lot more
- I was looking for these articles to come up in searching for "dataplane" and "arsenale" -- not included
-- https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/280249/how-can-i-generate-a-report-that-will-roll-up-time-estimates-for-linked-issues-and-the-issues-subtasks
-- https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/143647/estimates-not-rolling-up-to-parent

Thanks for looking into it.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47959].
  {panel}

We installed the Questions Add-on and created 4 topics in a space. We realized that the topics are available in all the space and we wanted to go live today but have disabled the add-on.
Is there a way to delete a topic? There has to be a way!
Will uninstalling the add-on remove everything and re-installing allow us to carefully design.
Are there things that need attention while uninstalling?
Could you please have a section called limitations and add such things for 1st time users

Thanks
Sri

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47955].
  {panel}

h3. Steps to reproduce
# Log into Confluence with an administrator (not system administrator) account.
# Remove all of the permissions from the Confluence Questions Permissions admin screen.

Once the admin user hits Save, they'll get a "You are not permitted to perform this operation" when the page reloads. From that point on it's impossible for a regular administrator to re-add the permissions, it has to be a system administrator. Given we don't grant customer accounts sysadmin privileges in OnDemand, this is problematic.
fields.summary: Unable to re-add permissions if all permissions is removed and user is an administrator (not sysadmin)

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47947].
  {panel}

CQ does not seem to be using clustered events when updating or adding a license to the plugin.

To replicate:

Current master of Confluence:
Run in cluster with two nodes
Install plugin on node1
Add license on node1 to be able to use CQ
Check upm on node2 plugin appears but is not active on the node even though it's showing up on upm.
fields.summary: Enable licensing update on CQ to have clustered events

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47945].
  {panel}

Expected behavior:
From a user information page in Questions, e.g., /questions/users?username=USERID ... I click on the "Contact Info" button then "View full profile". Should be taken to the user's Confluence profile page.

Actual behavior:
I still go to the same user information page that I was already on.
fields.summary: "View full profile" button doesn't go to user profile

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47944].
  {panel}

Creating a new question with no associated topics is permitted by the REST API (a 200 OK response is returned, and the question is created in the DB).

Creating a new question via the user interface requires that at least one topic should be selected.

If you try to view a question that was created via the API with no topics, a rendering error is thrown.

Either the UI should tolerate topic-less questions, or the API should reject topic-less questions before creating them.
fields.summary: REST API should not accept questions created with no topics

fields.description:
When an answer is provided with a link to a Confluence page and a notification is sent to the user, the link in the notification email routes to the Confluence dashboard (Specifically https://confluence.company.com/#)

The user navigates to the web interface of the question and clicks on the link and is routed to the appropriate page.

fields.summary: [Confluence question] Drag a file into a comment will show an error

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47922].
  {panel}

DatabaseNameHelper will fail in Oracle with error {{ORA-01424: missing or illegal character following the escape character}} when there is some table with special characters in their name.

{noformat}
Caused by: org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException: ConnectionCallback; SQL []; ORA-01424: missing or illegal character following the escape character
; nested exception is java.sql.SQLDataException: ORA-01424: missing or illegal character following the escape character

	at org.springframework.jdbc.support.SQLExceptionSubclassTranslator.doTranslate(SQLExceptionSubclassTranslator.java:78)
	at org.springframework.jdbc.support.AbstractFallbackSQLExceptionTranslator.translate(AbstractFallbackSQLExceptionTranslator.java:72)
	at org.springframework.jdbc.support.AbstractFallbackSQLExceptionTranslator.translate(AbstractFallbackSQLExceptionTranslator.java:80)
	at org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate.execute(JdbcTemplate.java:349)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.util.DatabaseNameHelperImpl$1.get(DatabaseNameHelperImpl.java:103)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.util.DatabaseNameHelperImpl$1.get(DatabaseNameHelperImpl.java:96)
	at com.google.common.base.Suppliers$MemoizingSupplier.get(Suppliers.java:109)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.util.DatabaseNameHelperImpl.getCaseSensitiveName(DatabaseNameHelperImpl.java:85)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.util.DatabaseNameHelperImpl.getCaseSensitiveTableName(DatabaseNameHelperImpl.java:64)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.repository.querydsl.AbstractRelationalPathBase.<init>(AbstractRelationalPathBase.java:14)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.repository.querydsl.ContentTable.<init>(ContentTable.java:28)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.repository.querydsl.QueryDSLMapper$7.apply(QueryDSLMapper.java:69)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.repository.querydsl.QueryDSLMapper$7.apply(QueryDSLMapper.java:65)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.repository.querydsl.QueryDSLMapper.getMapping(QueryDSLMapper.java:50)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.internal.upgrade.DuplicatedAcceptedAnswersRemover.deleteDuplicatedAcceptedAnswers(DuplicatedAcceptedAnswersRemover.java:40)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.questions.internal.upgrade.AnswerAcceptanceMigrationToAoUpgradeTask.upgrade(AnswerAcceptanceMigrationToAoUpgradeTask.java:66)
{noformat}

*Workaround:*

Uninstall version 1.0.618 and then install version 1.0.469, [available here|https://marketplace.atlassian.com/plugins/com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-questions/versions].
fields.summary: DatabaseNameHelper failing in Oracle
